Quarto PDF Vignettes

Source: vignettes/hello-pdf.qmd
hello-pdf.qmd

{{< include include/_intro.qmd >}}

PDF Vignette Engines

The quarto R package registers vignette engines that can be used in %\VignetteEngine{} directives in vignette headers.

To learn more about how vignettes engine works, and how to write vignette engines, see the Writing R Extensions manual and the R Packages (2e) book.

To produce a PDF vignette engine, add this to your YAML header

format: 
  pdf:
    toc: false
vignette: >
  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Vignette's Title}
  %\VignetteEngine{quarto::pdf}
  %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}

the vignette built will be a PDF vignette using Quarto’s defaults for format: pdf format, with only Table Of Content opted-out. This format will be using LaTeX to build the PDF, and so you will need to take precaution for a CRAN vignette. Refers to Writing R Extensions manual and CRAN policy.

Developed by JJ Allaire, Christophe Dervieux, Posit Software, PBC.
